tool_description: let our powerful AI generate meta descriptions for your web pages automatically. You just supply the web page link and we will do the rest.
name: AI Meta Description Generator
title: AI Meta Description Generator

api_list.name: Meta Description AI
api_list.description: Generate SEO/SERP optimized meta descriptions, generated by AI.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-meta-description-generator.p.rapidapi.com/url-to-meta/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-meta-description-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
